BALL::AtomNamePredicate

BALL::AtomNamePredicate Class Reference

#include <BALL/KERNEL/standardPredicates.h>

Inheritance diagram for BALL::AtomNamePredicate:

List of all members.


Public Member Functions

virtual bool operator() (const Atom &atom) const

Detailed Description

Predicate for matching atom names. Returns true, if the name of the atom matches the argument of this predicate. This is an exact match.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool BALL::AtomNamePredicate::operator() ( const Atom &  atom  )  const [virtual]

Evaluate the predicate for the atom atom.

Parameters:
atom the atom to test
Returns:
true, if the predicate is true, false otherwise
